str2: A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.
A disturbance, commotion, trouble. Masculine from tarasso; a disturbance, i.e. tumult.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A way, road, journey, path. Apparently a primary word; a road; by implication, a progress; figuratively, a mode or means.
